<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_1025229_lcms.hideButtonForSubmitter</name><script><![CDATA[// var x_1025229_lcms = x_1025229_lcms || {};

function hideButtonForSubmitter() {
    var userRoles = g_user.hasRole('submitter');
    var buttonElement = document.querySelector("button[data-id='myButton']");

    if (userRoles) {
        buttonElement.style.display = 'none';
    }
}

hideButtonForSubmitter();

]]></script><script_name>hideButtonForSubmitter</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-24 07:46:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>d98535fc47c321106e504aff336d4393</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1025229_lcms.hideButtonForSubmitter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LCMS" source="x_1025229_lcms">0d775003473261106e504aff336d43a7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LCMS">0d775003473261106e504aff336d43a7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_d98535fc47c321106e504aff336d4393</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-05-24 07:46:25</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
